channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Monica Crowley clears Senate confirmation for key State Department ambassadorship
item.description: Monica Crowley will now join the State Department in President Donald Trump's second administration. She was confirmed by the Senate on Monday night.

item.title: House Looks to Hike Work Requirements for Food Aid
item.description: U.S. House lawmakers on Monday laid out a plan to increase work requirements for some recipients of Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program food aid...

item.title: Stephen A. Smith Hits Back at Barkley's Dig at His Presidential Aspirations: ‘I Believe I Could Win’
DNC Seeks to Redo Hogg Vice Chair Vote

item.title: Far-left mayor arrested at ICE facility denies impeding law enforcement, says protest 'absolutely' effective
item.description: Newark Mayor Ras Baraka said in a debate Monday his actions that got him arrested days earlier at an ICE facility were "absolutely" an effective prote...

item.title: Giuliani to Newsmax: Can't Pigeonhole New Pope
item.description: Former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani told Newsmax on Monday that Pope Leo XIV is not a man who can easily be pinned down.

item.title: SEC Chair: Crypto Rules Crucial to US Market Growth

item.title: Now, You Too Can Buy a Batmobile - For $3 Million
Pentagon stopping gender transition treatment for transgender troops
item.description: The Pentagon is ending gender transition treatment for transgender troops, as the Trump administration moves to boot them from the U.S. military.

item.title: Trump targets massive investments in first Middle East trip
item.description: President Donald Trump tours Persian Gulf allies to push $2T in deals, counter Iran and revive U.S. influence amid Gaza war, nuclear tensions.

item.title: Winning Bigly: Tariff Receipts Top $16 Billion in April
